title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2380.11 - Secrecy of wage reporting information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2380.11 - Secrecy of wage reporting information

State Regulations

The provisions of subdivision (e) of section
697
of the Tax Law regarding secrecy
requirements and penalties for violation shall apply to all information
required under section 171-a and paragraph (4) of section
674 (a)
of the Tax Law and
these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2380.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
